Welcome to the EPM Icon Builder
This utility allows the creation of EPrints Bazaar Store icons which conform to the recommended format.
In order to build an icon a foreground image/icon is required, this can be uploaded below. It is recommended that this image be a simple symbol which represents your package.
Further, this image should contain the image on an alpha channeled transparent background.
Please upload this file below:
Note that processing example icons may take some time to complete once the image is uploaded.

On the left is shown the icon you uploaded with same icons shown at the bottom of this page.
If you are happy with one of the sample icons please save it to your disk and then include it in your package.
To choose a different background color, please use the tool below.
